page.title: 11COMMUNITY CENTRE
page.content: The Community Centre used to be the Symington School along time ago. Today the Community Centre is used for the Playgroup,Senior Youth Club, Discos,The Senior Badminton and The O.A.P's Evergreen Club. The hall in the Community Centre is quite small you can just fit a badminton court in it. There is a kitchen a cloakroom and some toilets. It isn't used very much any more because the new school has taken over. The Community Centre is quite near the big park.You will pass the Community Centre on the way or way back from Kilmarnock. There are two lots of toilets. The kitchen is used for refreshmants. The discos are good but the hall is a bit two small for about 50 people.
